SummaryEnglish: Tsumiki Domen is your everyday pink-haired Ordinary High-School Student. In her rush to get to class on time, Tsumiki bumps into a handsome boy known as Hero-Senpai. Feeling guilty, Tsumiki goes looking to apologize and ends up stumbling upon the Senpai Club, a club full of handsome and charming men (and one woman). However, the club members have no interest in attracting the attention of women, instead having created the club to learn about how to avoid women.

1.SummaryEnglish: Instrumental version of the Senpai Club OP, and a version of the video without the karaoke subtitles!

2.SummaryEnglish: Instrumental version of the Senpai Club ED, and a version of the video without the karaoke subtitles!

3.SummaryEnglish: Fumiko wants Teacher-Sensei to share this christmas day with her.

4.SummaryEnglish: Instrumental version of the second Senpai Club opening!

5.SummaryEnglish: The full version of the second Senpai Club ending song! This song is a heartfelt duet between Hero-Senpai and Bowlcut-Senpai.

6.SummaryEnglish: Finally the full version of the Senpai Club opening! The original version from back in 1986. Paired with some behind-the-scenes footage from the recording of the song, which totally happened 29 years ago

7.SummaryEnglish: Following the departure of Hero-Senpai the Senpai Club is at a standstill. How will they cope with the loss of such an important member?

8.TitleEnglish: Don't Graduate, Senpai! - Satellite Young (MUSIC VIDEO)
8.SummaryEnglish: Animated music video for "Don't Graduate, Senpai!/卒業しないで、先輩！" by Satellite Young, featuring characters from Senpai Club.

10.SummaryEnglish: Clip from Senpai Club (1986) Episode 53: “My Grandmother’s Recipe! The Curry Conundrum”

11.SummaryEnglish: Five years later, members of the former Senpai Club gather in northern Spain to honor a fallen friend.

12.SummaryEnglish: Another clip from Senpai Club (1986) Episode 53: “My Grandmother’s Recipe! The Curry Conundrum”

1.SummaryEnglish: Our main character, Tsumiki, finds herself in a bind as she arrives late for her first day of school. Additionally, she bumped into a hot guy on the way! Is there any limit to her troubles?

2.SummaryEnglish: Tsumiki manages to accidentally attend a Senpai Club meeting, where she gets to know some, to say the least, colorful and unusual characters. However, she seems to be having a hard time fitting in!

3.SummaryEnglish: While enjoying her lunch, Tsumiki spots a girl crying in the classroom! Could this be the beginning of a new friendship?

4.SummaryEnglish: New friends from around the world are everywhere to be found on Tsumiki's second day of high school!

5.SummaryEnglish: As Hero-Senpai finds himself infatuated with Tsumiki, he faces a tough dilemma. Should he follow his heart?

6.SummaryEnglish: In this episode, Tsumiki- Oh? Oh shit! Um, we're having some issues with the tapes here. Hopefully, it'll all work out.

7.SummaryEnglish: After a rough start and some awkward moments, Tsumiki and Hero-Senpai's date isn't going too well. In order for them to make any progress, surely something very dangerous and/or interesting has to happen!
